mapper.select: select recipe_no as recipeNo, recipe_title as recipeTitle, recipe_writer as recipeWriter, filepath, read_count as readCount, recipe_date recipeDate, subhead, recipe_video as recipeVideo, recipe_time as recipeTime, food_name as foodName, recipe_time as recipeTime, recipe_level as recipeLevel, (select member_nickname from member m where m.member_no=r.recipe_writer)as nickname, (select count(*) from recipe_like rr where rr.recipe_no = r.recipe_no and rr.member_no=#{memberNo}) as likeCheck, (select count(*) from recipe_report rp where rp.recipe_no = r.recipe_no and rp.member_no=#{memberNo}) as reportCheck from recipe_board r where recipe_no=#{recipeNo}
select material_no as materialNo, recipe_no as recipeNo, material_name as materialName, m_amount as mAmount from material where recipe_no=#{recipeNo}
select r_file_no as rFileNo, recipe_no as recipeNo, filename, filepath, recipe_content as recipeContent from recipe_content where recipe_no=#{recipeNo}

select r_comment_no as rCommentNo, recipe_no as recipeNo, rc_content as rcContent, rc_date as rcDate, member_no as memberNo, (select member_nickname from member m where m.member_no = rc.member_no)as nickname from recipe_comment rc where recipe_no=#{recipeNo}
mapper.update: update recipe_comment set rc_content=#{rcContent} where r_comment_no=#{rCommentNo}
update recipe_board set read_count=read_count +1 where recipe_no=#{recipeNo}
mapper.delete: delete from recipe_like where recipe_no =#{recipeNo} and member_no=#{memberNo}
mapper.update: update recipe_board set recipe_delete=0 where recipe_no=#{recipeNo}
update recipe_content set recipe_content=#{recipeContent} where r_file_no=#{rFileNo}
mapper.select: select product_no as productNo, recipe_no as recipeNo, milkit_name as milkitName, milkit_price as milkitPrice, milkit_comment as milkitComment, filepath, milkit_delete as milkitDelte from product where recipe_no=#{recipeNo} and milkit_delete=1

select recipe_no as recipeNo, recipe_writer as recipeWriter, filepath, read_count as readCount, count(member_no) likeCnt from recipe_board left outer join recipe_like using(recipe_no) where recipe_writer in #{member_No} group by recipe_no, recipe_writer, filepath, read_count order by recipe_no desc
